features: 【Professional Kitchen Knife Set】1x Chef's knife, 1x Santoku knife,1x Utility knife. This pro-grade cutlery chef knife set can easily handle all your kitchen tasks like chopping, slicing, dicing, mincing of meat ,fruits and vegetables. This sharp knife is suitable for home and professional use. Cutting like a master chef will bring you more joy in the kitchen!

【German High Quality Steel】Precision-forged from imported premium quality, high-carbon German steel-5CR15MOV.The carbon content is 0.5%, ensuring this chef's knives have super sharpness and hardness. This kitchen knife is easy to clean. Hand-washing is better, please wipe dry with a cloth after washing, which can prevent rust, corrosion and extend the service life.

【Ultra-Sharp Edge】Sharpness is key. Hand polished by craftsmen with decades of experience to ensure long-lasting sharpness. The thickness of this kitchen knife is 2.2mm. 58 HRC has sufficient hardness and toughness. the well-forged 15degrees per side blade edge is sturdy and sharp to get the job done perfectly.

【Full Tang Ergonomic Handle】 Ergonomic handle minimizes wrist tension while providing a safe and comfortable grip, no matter your hand size or where you grip, Even after prolonged use, your palms and wrists will not get tired. It is very suitable for those who love cooking. The triple riveted handle securely fixes the handle on the blade. Ensure the durability and reliability of the kitchen knife.

【Gifts And Lifetime Warranty】Try it risk free.This kitchen knife set is equipped with a high-quality black gift box, It's a great gift for those who love cooking.Every Topfeel product includes a 60-day refund and free exchange & lifelong warranty..We are always here to provide you with the most satisfactory solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow...can't believe these knives for the price. Buy them. You won't be sorry.
reviews.reviewText: Ok...if you are ultra picky about your knives and just can't bring yourself to spend less than $30 (if the 20% discount still applies) on a set of carbon steel knives. Then, you should look elsewhere. And yes, that's right, I said a SET of knives, not just one knife. Of course, I have purchased more expensive knives, and yes, they perform a little better, but honestly, these TOPFEEL knives hold an edge very well. Some of our friends who are former chefs and caterers have used them right alongside our other knives, and everyone is quite surprised at the performance.Honestly, we've found ourselves using the smaller paring knife more that we thought we would. The smaller size along with the sharp carbon steel edge is great for cleaning up chicken breasts or cutting veggies where a smaller blade is more useful. As promised the Santoku knife is great for mincing and chopping, and the chef's knife stands up to our other more expensive knives quite well.If you or your family like to cook and you've never invested in better knives, I'd highly recommend this set. All in all, at this price, what's the risk?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm no chef but these knifes are an amazing deal, crazy high quality and great looks and the set is basically every knife you would need for kitchen use with no extra fluff.When you use a knife it gets dull, get a simple sharpener and learn how to use it. Ridiculous that someone would complain about the edge dulling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holds an edge well
reviews.reviewText: These came quite sharp, but without the taper that I get with a whetstone. After a few months, I have now resharpened them by hand to get the more durable gradual taper that I like on my knives.I do have a few pet peeves about knife usage:-Use a slicing knife with a slicing motion, not a chopping motion.-Use the right size knife for the right job.-Don't use a slicing knife to cut hard things like carrots, raw potatoes, and preferably even onions.With careful usage, knife edges last a lot longer. At the microscopic level, they go dull by getting knicks and chips in the very edge.By the way, note that these knife tangs have a slanted edge, so they insert nicely in a slanted knife block, but not so nicely in a square position. Most knives are the reverse. The positive side of this is that the knife blade and the handle are completely unified and there is a tapered edge between the handle and the blade, all part of one piece of steel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Above average quality for the price
reviews.reviewText: These knives cut beautifully and I absolutely loved them for probably about the first 6 months. They're still my go-to knives but they're starting to become a pain to maintain. I'm no sharpening expert and I'm sure most of us aren't, so the most I'll do for these is try to run them through my V-sharpener for a few minutes but it's never quite as good as they were out the box. That being said, they've got a good weight to them and they've stayed shiny and beautiful, so for the price I'd definitely recommend buying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These excellent knives are way underpriced!
reviews.reviewText: I bought the three knife set while a long-term guest in a house that had no good knives. I'm an avid amateur cook and a bit of a knife junky, and I needed something decent to work with. These knives blew me away. They arrived much sharper than expected, no need to hone them at all. They are sturdy and ergonomic. They balance well. I've used them quite a bit now, and they hold their edge as well as any knives I have owned. I have paid more for lesser knives. I would expect to pay much more for knives of this quality. Seriously, I don't exaggerate in my reviews. These are wonderful knives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: When I first started to buy a knife, I spent a lot of time researching and reading a lot of reviews.Later, I ordered this set of basic knives. In fact, I didn't expect much, because I don't think I can buy a good knife at such a price level. Maybe it will rust after several times？🤔 But I want give it a try after reading their reviews.When I received the goods, nice package , shiny knives, you can see the manufacturer's passion.I am so grateful for choosing the right knives set for myself. I have used over one month it still working perfectly. I love them and strongly recommend! Thank you for producing the good knives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great knives for the price!
reviews.reviewText: These are actually great knives for the price. I use them regularly for dinner prep. It's nice to have a few so one is always clean and ready while the others might be in the dishwasher.

Every household needs a chef’s knife whether it has a cook or not. I got mine primarily to cut pineapples, I love the way it is designed, sturdy built, easy to use and extremely sharp and precise. The set comes with chef knife, santoku knife and paring knife, which are ideal for beginner’s. It is easy to wash with warm and soapy water, stainless steel and no dish washer. If you don’t want to break the bank, I would recommend this product.
These knives are a lot lighter than I have previously used which took a little to get used to but so far have found them to be nice to use and very sharp. Super happy with the quality.
The weight is very nice to use and very sharp

Love this set! Very sharp and well put together! Love the different knives for different usage! As with any knife set I do not put them into a dishwasher to clean them and I know they will last a long time! Perfect weight and love the box as I use it to keep them in!
Very pleased with the knives. They are very sharp and are a joy to use. It was so nice to be able to cut raw potato so thin you could see through it. I will be buying again as gifts.
